headline: Royal Caribbean Expands Caribbean Routes And Antarctic Luxury For Future Growth
summary: Royal Caribbean Cruises (NYSE:RCL) is rolling out new Caribbean itineraries for the 2027 to 2028 seasons, with a bigger focus on its private island experiences and onboard activities. The company is also introducing a Silversea branded hotel in Chile to serve as a pre and post cruise base for guests on Antarctic expedition voyages. These moves are aimed at attracting younger travelers to the Caribbean portfolio and deepening Royal Caribbean's presence in the luxury expedition segment. Royal...
